notes:
This dataset contains Lake Chad data for the Map Explorer that is derived from other data.  
WARNING: Derived data - go to original sources!  
Sources:  
[Lake Chad Administrative Boundaries](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/lac-chad-basin-area)  
[OCHA ROWCA Online Reporting System](http://ors.ocharowca.info/KeyFigures/KeyFiguresListingPublic.aspx)  
[ACLED Conflict Data for Africa Realtime 2017](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-realtime-2017)  
[ACLED Conflict Data for Africa 1997-2016](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-1997-2016)  
[OCHA Financial Tracking Service](https://fts.unocha.org/)  
[WFP VAM MarketMonitor](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/market-monitor)
